Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem in a fantastic location”

Reviews.Content: looking lovely rest head 5 mins walk blue mosque flat bang tourist central fors hotel staff happily chat hours lovely country fors true 3 star decent bed night added bonus cracking breakfast arent huge romantic grand cleaned daily change sheets ac shower pressure bathrooms pretty travel hotels purely lay head safe clean environment fors fitted perfectly staying please visit hamman road built male husband 3 hour treat session incl massage wouldnt stop raving wasnt hamman life unfortunately female version pants cost staff rude basically washed 5 min scrub massage told start finish 30mins pure rip pure dissappointment honest extremely gutted wasnt id id return istanbul definitely stay fors theres supermarkets close cluster streets containing fantastic hip restaraunts equally cheap eateries pros value money friendly staff fantastic location rooftop terrace cons little romantics

Reviews.Content: hotel definitely close attractions istanbul major hotel steep stairs poor construction fit hurting yourself angle stairs constructed makes near impossible climb properly carrying luggage isnt pleasant booked week night decided elsewhere beds werent comfy bathroom tiny wasnt space move thats live location minutes walk major attractions climbing steep hill 10 minutes main street breakfast faced return hotel
